Brenda Andrea Smith Lezama (a mụrụya  n'ụbọchị nke 25 n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 1994) bụ onye Panama-American na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nta akụkọ, onye nlereanya na onye na-ahụ maka ịma mma nke e chiri Señorita Panamá 2021
Ọ nọchitere anya Panama na asọmupi Miss Universe 2021 na Eilat, Israel.
A mụrụ Smith na Georgia, United States
Nna ya bu onye Panamá ma nne ya bụ onye Mexico
Smith nwetara BA na akwụkwọ akụkọ na Mahadum nke Missouri
Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị BA ya na ọrụ nta akụkọ, ọ na-atụ anya ijikọta mmasị ya maka ọrụ nta akụkọ na ịhụnanya ya maka mba ya site na isonyere United States Air Force dị ka Ọkachamara Mgbasa Ozi.
N'afọ 2015, ọ pụtara na nnekwu ihe ngosi telivishọn, gụnyere PBS NewsHour, Dr
Drew na Call na MSNBC Live
N'afọ 2018, ọ pụtara na usoro telivishọn El gordo y la flaca, República Deportiva, Nuestra Belleza Latina, ¡Wake up America!
na Los Cousins
O mekwara dịka onye na-agwọ ọrịa na obere ihe nkiri "Reversion".
O mere Verletta Walker na obere ihe nkiri "Little Stylist", nke ewepụtara na United States na June 1, n'afọ 2019.
Smith malitere ọrụ ịma mma ya n'afọ 2012, na-abanye na Miss Georgia Teen USA 2012, ebe ọ bụ onye nke abụọ.
Smith banyere ma bụrụ onye okpueze na 2013 Miss Missouri Teen USA ma Jayde Ogle nọchiri ya.
Na August 10, n'afọ 2013, Smith nọchitere anya Missouri na 2013 Miss Teen USA pageant na Grand Ballroom, Atlantis Paradise Island na Nassau, Bahamas
O mechara na Top 16.
Smith banyere ma tinye ya na onye nke mbụ na asọmupi Miss Georgia USA 2017 ma mesịa merie onye mmeri DeAnna Johnson nke Hazlehurst.
Smith sọrọ mpi dị ka MxU Mexico City, otu n'ime ndị ikpeazụ iri atọ na asọmupi ịma mma nke mba ya na Mexicana Universal 2020
Ọ nọ n'ọkwa nke abụọ ma merie onye mmeri Andrea Meza si Chihuahua
Na Nọvemba 7, n'afọ 2021, Smith sonyere ma nọchite anya Panama Centro na asọmupi Señorita Panamá 2021 na Wyndham Convention Center Hotel na Panama City.
Na ngwụcha ihe omume ahụ, Smith meriri aha Miss Universe Panama 2021 ma nọchie anya Carmen Jaramillo.
Na Disemba 13, n'afo 2021, Smith nọchitere anya Panama na asọmupi Miss Universe 2021 na Eilat, Israel, ma mechaa na Top 16.
